text: Hello
This is NCT NEWS where we deliver NCT's hot news every month
I'm TAEYONG
Hi, I'm YUTA
NCT NEWS is brought to you every month

(SHOTARO news presenter, "You got this, guys!") we're here with more news
TAEYONG, how did you like NCT SHOW episode 4?
It was really fun
("The teddy bear impressed the crowd with his dance") HAECHAN's dance was very impressive
(Episode 4 of "THE NCT SHOW" was very popular) It was a very fun and exciting moment,
(Stay tuned for "THE NCT SHOW" episode 5!) I'm excited for the new NCT SHOW!
TAEYONG and I will make sure to stay vibrant and make this
(YUTA, TAEYONG, born in 1995, will show great chemistry) another exciting episode of NCT SHOW
Let me introduce the first news to you
Here is the first news
Last May,
(NCT 127, on a world tour concert in Japan) NCT 127 Neo City Japan The Link
(NCT 127, on a world tour concert in Japan) NCT gave successful performances in Nagoya and Tokyo
I heard that NCTzens at the scene showed great enthusiasm
(NCT 127, impressed by NCTzen at the dome tour) NCT 127 said that they were touched by the fans
(NCT 127, coming June 25-26 in Osaka) NCT 127 is working hard
("Wait, NCTzen") on upcoming performances at Kyocera Dome Osaka
(NCTzen, "Come 127") on June 25 and 26,
TAEYONG, how did you like performing in Japan?
First, it was our performance together in such  along time
It was such a happy and meaningful day
because we got to say hello to NCTzen in Japan
I'm also really excited about the upcoming performances in Osaka
YUTA, how did you feel?
I felt the same, I was a bit nervous to perform in such a long time,
but thanks to our fans' support, everything went great
I'll make sure to do my best for the upcoming Osaka concert
(Japanese) (Please tell us in Japanese)
(It was our first concert in Japan in 2 years and 3 months,)
(so I was quite nervous)
(But thanks to you guys, we were able to safely finish the Nagoya and Tokyo performances)
- (Please be excited about the Osaka performances) - (Please be excited)
Also, vlogs about the quarantine in Japan
(Self-quarantine vlog "A DAY 1N M2 Roo7N") "A DAY 1N M2 Roo7N" was released
(NCT 127 / (Green tea eating show)) Each member showed their unique charm
and NCTzen liked it very much
Travel video they filmed in Japan will be released soon,
so please show lots of love and support
Unfortunately, TAEIL and JOHNNY were unable to film with us
(A short call with TAEYONG and JOHNNY) I hear you did a short video call with JOHNNY
(TAEYONG, gave a special gift to TAEIL) - and bought a special gift to TAEIL / - Right
How was your trip?
First of, JOHNNY, DOYOUNG, and I planned on traveling together,
but unfortunately, JOHNNY couldn't join us
- We called to make sure he was doing okay - That's nice
TAEIL also likes Shiba Inu a lot,
so he really wanted to visit the Shiba Inu Cafe,
and at a hat store we visited, they had a hat with a very cute Shiba on it
(TAEIL shows off his gift, "TY bought it for me") I got reminded of him and gave it to him, and he liked it
- so it was a meaningful gift - Nice
Next news
(NCT DREAM "Beatbox," successful promotion) Here's the news for NCT DREAM's 2nd repackage album, "Beatbox"
("Beatbox" challenge, very popular on social media) Before "Beatbox" came out, NCT DREAM
released various challenge videos they made myself through social media
Many people, including the fans, participated in the challenge
Also, NCT DREAM has said that while performing "Beatbox"
they were very happy to see the fans in person
(JENO, sharing his feelings on "Beatbox") NCT DREAM's JENO sent us a comment
(JENO, sharing his feelings on "Beatbox") YUTA, please tell us about it
(JENO, sharing his feelings on "Beatbox") It was so much fun to be with NCTzen on a music show
This is exactly what we wanted
They even made us a fanchant, which gave us so much support on stage
I don't want us to ever be separated again
That's the comment he made
As always, JENO has sent us
(JENO, "Thank you") - a heartwarming and cute comment / - Right
Also, on June 11 at 11pm,
(NCT DREAM, very successful NHK "Venue101" performance) "Venue101" broadcasted on NHK
(NCT DREAM, very successful NHK "Venue101" performance) received great enthusiasm
I enjoyed watching their "Beatbox" performances myself
I heard you also participated in the "Beatbox" challenge

As you know, I started doing TikTok
NCT DREAM's song is really good,
(Check out TAEYONG's challenge at "@tik_tyong") so I danced to it automatically
(Check out TAEYONG's challenge at "@tik_tyong") - It was so cool / - Thank you
Okay, next news
(KUN, TAEIL, YANGYANG are preparing for "NCT LAB") NCT's KUN, TAEIL, and YANGYANG are preparing NCT LAB
KUN has written the lyrics and composed the melody himself
(KUN, "Very happy to sing this our members!") I'm really excited to hear the song!
KUN has shared his views even as they worked at the recording studio
Thanks to him, the recording went smoothly
Also, they recently filmed a music video for it, so please stay tuned
Also, on June 18,
NCT DREAM appeared at the 28th Dream Concert
NCT DREAM members said they were so happy to see all the green lights
(NCT DREAM happy to see the green wave) that NCTzen were holding in the audience
We have another good news
At the DREAM Concert,
(DOYOUNG, Dream Concert MC did a great job!) DOYOUNG was selected as the MC
NCTzen was happy to see that NCT DOYOUNG,
who has been active in many fields, even became the MC for Dream Concert
I can't wait to hear the behind-the-scenes stories
about how he prepared for it and what chemistry he showed with NCT DREAM members
I heard there is another good news, YUTA
(JAEHYUN participated in the fashion week as "PRADA" ambassador) NCT JAEHYUN participated in the fashion week as a PRADA ambassador
This is another good news after NCT JOHNNY's participation at the Met Gala
JAEHYUN participated in the Fashion Week held in Italy on June 19
and looked amazing
In addition to Fashion Week, JAEHYUN also filmed videos about his trip to Italy
(JAEHYUN, "Be excited to see me in Italy!") NCTzen, please stay tuned
Hosted by MC TAEYONG

Did you all watch it?
I watched it too, and it was really fun
- TAEYONG, how was it? - How was it?
I met a lot of very passionate people

(It's a reality show where you can see people) As a person who loves dancing,
(who aren't good at dancing trying their best to dance) it made my passion for dancing become
even higher
Please give lots of support and love for "Any Body Can Dance"
